sentences.en: And, at this particular moment, we are confronted by the picture of an uncontrolled gusher of oil spewing destruction into the gulf.
sentences.cn: 在这个特殊时期，我们面对的是一副这样的景象——海湾内的石油喷井无法控制下来，石油不停的流向海岸。

sentences.en: Last year's Gulf of Mexico oil spill was but one blowout amid a gusher of corporate misdeeds, according to this expose of the British oil giant.
sentences.cn: 根据此书对英国石油巨头的披露，去年的墨西哥湾石油泄露是一个存在无数违规操作中的自喷井的一次井喷。

words.tran_cn: 喷油井；说话滔滔不绝的人

trans.tran_en: a place in the ground where oil or water comes out very forcefully, so that a pump is not needed
